text: Herviella claror is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Herviella claror Burn, 1963. Accessed on 2018-02-18. This species was derived from Australia.Rudman, W.B., 2005 (September 27) Herviella claror Burn, 1963. [In] Sea Slug Forum. Australian Museum, Sydney. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1963
title: Herviella claror
